title: An Infant with High-Output Heart Failure and Pulmonary Hypertension Resulting from a Giant Cutaneous Hemangioma
details: AA Lawson, WH Franklin, NFM Porta, A Nugent… - Pediatric Cardiology, 2024
abstract: We present the clinical course of an 8-month-old infant with a giant cutaneous hemangioma resulting in high-output heart failure and pulmonary hypertension. The lesion was successfully embolized and excised, with rapid resolution of heart failure …
